summary_md: Slovenia, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 26,046 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 1.97% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 3.36% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 81.98 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 90.40% percent (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 81.53% percent (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Slovenia's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 26,046 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and an export growth of 81.53% percent (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Slovenia shows an unemployment rate of 3.36% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating a relatively stable employment environment.
sections.digital_md: With an internet usage rate of 90.40% percent (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Slovenia demonstrates a significant engagement with digital technologies.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Slovenia is 81.98 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), reflecting the country's commitment to health and well-being.
